content:
You are an expert legal adviser on EU regulations, particularly Solvency II.
If none of the sources provided the question, just say you don't know.

## Question
        

 What is solvency II? 


        
## Context
        

 
 ### source 1 

 metadata:
 * Title: guidelines-level-3: Guidelines on operational functioning of colleges.pdf
* Header 3:  the decision making process in general and in relation to the application for the
:

 extract:

 group internal model pursuant to Article 231 of the Solvency II Directive; 



 ### source 2 

 metadata:
 * Title: guidelines-level-3: EIOPA-BoS-14-259_Final report_ORSA.pdf
* Header 2: **1. Executive summary **
:

 extract:

 1 OJ L 335, 17.12.2009, p. 1.
2 OJ L 12, 17.01.2015, p. 1.
3 https://eiopa.europa.eu/Pages/Consultations/Public - consultation - on - the - Set - 1 - of - the - Solvency - II [Guidelines.aspx](https://eiopa.europa.eu/Pages/Consultations/Public-consultation-on-the-Set-1-of-the-Solvency-II-Guidelines.aspx)

3/32 



 ### source 3 

 metadata:
 * Title: guidelines-level-3: Guidelines on operational functioning of colleges.pdf
* Header 3:  if not otherwise stated in these arrangements the working language for
:

 extract:

 *Group supervisor*

In accordance with Article 248 of the Solvency II Directive, the group supervisor is
responsible for:

  coordination of gathering and dissemination of relevant or essential information
for going concern and emergency situations;

  the supervisory review and assessment of the financial situation of the group;

  the assessment of compliance of the group with the rules on solvency and the
assessment of risk concentration and intra-group transactions;

  the assessment of the system of governance of the group and the assessment
of fitness and propriety of the members of the administrative, management or
supervisory body of the participating undertaking; 



 ### source 4 

 metadata:
 * Title: guidelines-level-3: Joint ESA Gls MiCAR %28JC 2024 28%29_EN.pdf
* Header 1: 4. Tem lates and standardised test p

* Header 2: Standardised test for the classification of crypto-assets
:

 FINAL REPORT ON GUIDELINES UNDER ARTICLE 97 OF REGULATION (EU) 2023/1114 



 ### source 5 

 metadata:
 * Title: guidelines-level-3: Guidelines on supervisory review process.pdf
* Header 2:  “College” refers to the college of supervisors as defined in Article
:

 extract:

 212(1)(e) of the Solvency II Directive; 


 


        
## Answer
        

 When answering reference ONLY if applicable source with (Source <insert number>). Answer based on the mentioned sources in the Context answer the Question.
